cohortName: [PL 316139004] Heart failure prevalent cohort, defined as the earliest condition occurrence of 'Heart Failure' conceptset with a second condition occurrence in the 365d after entry
logicDescription: Heart failure prevalent cohort, defined as the earliest condition occurrence of 'Heart Failure' conceptset with a second condition occurrence in the 365d after entry

cohortName: [PL 316139001] Heart failure referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (316139) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 316139002] Heart failure referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (316139) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 316139003] Heart failure during hospitalization, defined by condition occurrences of 'Heart Failure' conceptset occurring between start and end of inpatient visit
logicDescription: Heart failure during hospitalization, defined by condition occurrences of 'Heart Failure' conceptset occurring between start and end of inpatient visit
